name: Escape Condition
description:
ESCAPE CONDITION is a time-travel RPG featuring intense First-person Shooter action, combining impactful gunplay with powerful MAGIC abilities.

After you choose to play as one of three player classes, ESCAPE CONDITION features a time travel-based campaign that presents a crucial choice each day: Travel to the PAST to alter humanity's essence, or travel to the FUTURE to change the AI that dictates modern and future society. Your choices will directly affect your character, the NPCs you battle, and the environment you fight in. This completely responsive world will be updated weekly to improve gameplay based on player feedback, leading up to full release.
